abstract: Damir Sagolj was part of a group of journalists invited to document the food crisis in North Korea's farm belt late in September. His images, captured on a government-led tour, present a stark view of a rarely-seen region.
snippet: Damir Sagolj was part of a group of journalists invited to document the food crisis in North Korea's farm belt late in September. His images, captured on a government-led tour, present a stark view of a rarely-seen region.

headline.main: A View of Hunger in North Korea
